content: अभिनिविश् {c6c} <ab>A.</ab> (<ls>P. I. 4. 47</ls>) ({%a%}) To enter into, be settled in; to occupy, set foot in. ({%b%}) To take possession of, resort to, be attached to (with <ab>acc.</ab>); अभिनिविशते सन्मार्गं <ls>Sk.</ls> takes to, follows, a good path; सैवं धन्या गणिकादारिका यामेवं भवन्मनोऽभिनिविशते <ls>Dk. 57</ls>, <ls>Mu. 5. 12</ls>, <ls>Bk. 8. 80.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To make one enter or occupy, lead, carry or conduct to; (<ab>fig.</ab>) apply, direct or turn (as mind, heart &c.) towards something; प्रतिबंधवत्स्वपि विषयेषु अभिनिवेश्य <ls>M. 3</ls>, <ls>Śi. 1. 15</ls>
